'''Nether brick stairs''' are a [[Nether Bricks|Nether brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Nether brick stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Nether Brick Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Nether brick stairs generate as part of [[Nether fortress]]es.
